import {useState } from "react"; export const NavBar = () => { const [isLoggedIn , setIsLoggedIn ] = useState(false); const clickHandlerLogIn = () => { isLoggedIn ? setIsLoggedIn(false) : setIsLoggedIn(true); } return (
Fintrack
  • Home
  • DashBoard
  • Expenses Table
  • About Us
{!isLoggedIn ? (
  • Sign in
  • Sign Up
) : (
)}
) } export default NavBar;
